identified_risks.risk_description: Limited internal cloud expertise delays migration tasks and quality.
identified_risks.response_actions: Implement intensive AWS training for key staff. Pair experienced consultants with internal teams for knowledge transfer. Phased migration approach.

identified_risks.risk_description: Key Cloud Architect contractor departs before critical migration phases end.
identified_risks.response_actions: Negotiate contract extension for Alex Thompson. Identify and train internal backup (David Park). Document all architecture decisions thoroughly.

identified_risks.risk_description: Database migration (2TB+) exceeds 4hr downtime or causes data loss.
identified_risks.response_actions: Use AWS Database Migration Service with continuous replication. Conduct multiple full-scale test migrations. Prepare detailed rollback plan.

identified_risks.risk_description: Delay in AWS contract finalization postpones project critical path.
identified_risks.response_actions: Escalate contract finalization with legal and procurement. Prepare alternative initial tasks not dependent on AWS account. Weekly follow-up.

identified_risks.risk_description: Failure to meet SOX/PCI-DSS compliance in new AWS environment.
identified_risks.response_actions: Engage compliance experts early. Use AWS compliance-ready services. Conduct pre-audits and regular compliance checks. Document all controls.

identified_risks.risk_description: Legacy app incompatibility with AWS leads to extensive rework/delays.
identified_risks.response_actions: Conduct thorough application assessment and PoCs for refactoring/replatforming. Allocate budget/time for potential rework. Prioritize apps for migration.

identified_risks.risk_description: Insufficient network bandwidth delays 2TB+ data migration.
identified_risks.response_actions: Assess current bandwidth and AWS Direct Connect options. Plan for offline data transfer (e.g., AWS Snowball) if needed. Schedule transfers during off-peak hours.

identified_risks.risk_description: Security Officer's conflicting schedule delays critical security audit.
identified_risks.response_actions: Negotiate Security Officer's schedule priority. Identify a qualified backup for audit tasks. Break down audit into smaller, flexible parts.

identified_risks.risk_description: Project costs exceed fixed $450k budget due to unforeseen issues.
identified_risks.response_actions: Implement strict change control. Regularly monitor budget vs. actuals. Prioritize essential scope items. Identify cost-saving opportunities.

identified_risks.risk_description: Ineffective staff training causes operational errors post-migration.
identified_risks.response_actions: Develop comprehensive, role-based training. Use hands-on labs. Provide post-go-live support and refresher sessions. Certify key personnel.
